hooks.name: Context Pressure Warning
hooks.action: PRESSURE >60% - checkpoint recommended. Save state or wrap up current task.
hooks.action_payload: PRESSURE >60% - checkpoint recommended. Save state or wrap up current task.
hooks.message: PRESSURE >60% - checkpoint recommended. Save state or wrap up current task.

hooks.name: Context Pressure Critical
hooks.action: PRESSURE >80% - COMPACTION IMMINENT. Save state NOW via state_save + todo_update.
hooks.action_payload: PRESSURE >80% - COMPACTION IMMINENT. Save state NOW via state_save + todo_update.
hooks.message: PRESSURE >80% - COMPACTION IMMINENT. Save state NOW via state_save + todo_update.

hooks.name: High Call Count Advisory
hooks.action: 35+ tool calls - approaching context limits. Finish current task and save.
hooks.action_payload: 35+ tool calls - approaching context limits. Finish current task and save.
hooks.message: 35+ tool calls - approaching context limits. Finish current task and save.

hooks.name: Safety Validation Reminder
hooks.description: Reminds to validate safety for cutting calcs
hooks.action: SAFETY: Validate S(x)>=0.70 for cutting force results. Use prism_validate -> safety.
hooks.action_payload: SAFETY: Validate S(x)>=0.70 for cutting force results. Use prism_validate -> safety.
hooks.message: SAFETY: Validate S(x)>=0.70 for cutting force results. Use prism_validate -> safety.

hooks.name: Speed/Feed Safety Check
hooks.action: SPEED/FEED: Cross-check against machine spindle limits and tool max RPM.
hooks.action_payload: SPEED/FEED: Cross-check against machine spindle limits and tool max RPM.
hooks.message: SPEED/FEED: Cross-check against machine spindle limits and tool max RPM.

hooks.name: Build After Code Changes
hooks.description: Reminds to build after source edits
hooks.action: CODE CHANGED - run npm run build before testing. Not live until rebuild + restart.
hooks.action_payload: CODE CHANGED - run npm run build before testing. Not live until rebuild + restart.
hooks.message: CODE CHANGED - run npm run build before testing. Not live until rebuild + restart.

hooks.name: Backup Critical Files
hooks.description: Backup before editing autoHookWrapper or cadenceExecutor
hooks.action: BACKUP FIRST: Run backup-before-edit.ps1 before editing autoHookWrapper. Previous destruction 2026-02-18.
hooks.action_payload: BACKUP FIRST: Run backup-before-edit.ps1 before editing autoHookWrapper. Previous destruction 2026-02-18.
hooks.message: BACKUP FIRST: Run backup-before-edit.ps1 before editing autoHookWrapper. Previous destruction 2026-02-18.

hooks.name: Anti-Regression Gate
hooks.description: Verify new >= old before file replacements
hooks.action: ANTI-REGRESSION: Verify new version >= old functionality. Use prism_validate -> anti_regression.
hooks.action_payload: ANTI-REGRESSION: Verify new version >= old functionality. Use prism_validate -> anti_regression.
hooks.message: ANTI-REGRESSION: Verify new version >= old functionality. Use prism_validate -> anti_regression.
